subject: Just an accelerator pedal
description_text:
Hello,

I urgently need an accelerator pedal. Do you also sell accelerator pedals individually, like the clutch?

Thank you very much for your reply.

Kind regards, 

Yves Walzer

conversations.body_text: Hi Yves Walzer,    I apologize for not responding to you promptly. You may purchase a clutch and note that you wish to replace it with a throttle pedal.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-simulator-pedal-black
